entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 3:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
